article: pope benedict xvi said monday that he hoped the blood shed by a roman catholic priest slain in turkey over the weekend would become the `` seeds of hope '' to build a lasting fraternity between peoples .
abstract: pope prays that blood of slain priest in turkey becomes seeds of hope for fraternity
